title: Finally!
author: JGray
text:
Hidden Name: Roxie Silver

It only took five years but, finally... well, here ya go. :)

I expect comments! Many comments! Let's see if we can hit 20!

See you Monday.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Called it.
It's about time that happened.
Real-world time that is, not neccesarily comic-time. :p

I wonder why it's so common for this to happen in stories at critical times, as if the protagonist didn't have enough on his/her mind what with being in mortal danger, now you dump all those romantic feelings and thoughts on top of it as well.

replies.author: Fairportfanj*Guest*
replies.text: Isn't that pretty much the same pose/expressions as when Krys kissed Theresa, all those comics ago?

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: I can't believe i typo'd my own name.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: "We're bout to enter a Forbidden Zone, to possibly engage in Mortal Combat with an Evil Mastermind...LEMME GIVE YAS A KISS!!!"

replies.author: Musical_life*Guest*
replies.text: I see this certainly being an RPG or a VN.

replies.author: Kietra61871
replies.text: It was bound to happen... just took forever to finally get around to it!
